# Manish Goel

> Principal Engineer with 19+ years of expertise in systems architecture, performance engineering, and developer enablement.

## Contact

- Email: manish.dce@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/magoel
- Website: https://magoel.github.io/

## Current Role

Principal Software Engineer at Microsoft (Dec 2019 – Present)
- Performance & Reliability for Microsoft Office (mobile and desktop)
- Reduced mobile file-open latency by 55% (P95: 20s → 9s)
- Raised reliability from 95% → 99.3%
- Architected Meteor-stack (media-blob deferral) for Microsoft Word
- Building AI agents for automated bug triage and troubleshooting

## Previous Experience

Lead Member of Consulting Staff at Mentor Graphics (Jun 2008 – Dec 2019)
- Built high-performance utilities library 2× faster than C++ STL
- Designed parallel simulation architecture for Questa Simulator
- Created custom debugging/profiling infrastructure for JIT code

Member of Technical Staff at Interra Systems (Aug 2006 – Jun 2008)
- Designed SPOA (Spice-to-OpenAccess translator)

## Skills

- Languages: C/C++ (C++20), JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Verilog, VHDL
- Domains: Performance Engineering, Distributed Systems, EDA, Developer Tooling
- Tools: GDB, Valgrind, VTune, GCC, Git, VS Code

## Education

- B.E. Electrical Engineering, Delhi College of Engineering (2002-2006) - Gold Medalist
- PGDM Marketing & Finance, IIM Lucknow (2011-2013)

## Key Strengths

- Strong ownership mindset
- Ability to simplify complex systems
- Mentoring engineers to technical excellence
- Cross-team leadership and alignment

## Blog

Visit https://magoel.github.io/blog/ for articles on engineering, performance, and software development.
